SELECT jbre.id as id, jbre.name as name, jbre.parentId as pId, (CASE WHEN jbor.role_id IS NOT NULL THEN 'true' ELSE '' END) as 'checked', (CASE WHEN jbre.isValid=1 and jbor.role_id IS NOT NULL THEN 'true' ELSE '' END) as 'open', (CASE WHEN jbre.isValid!=1 or jbor.th_org_Id IS NULL THEN 'true' ELSE '' END) as 'chkDisabled' FROM JY_BASE_RESOURCES jbre LEFT JOIN (SELECT thjbor.org_Id as th_org_Id, thjbor.resources_id as resources_id, tjbrr.role_id as role_Id FROM jy_base_org_resources thjbor LEFT JOIN (SELECT t.role_id,t.resources_id FROM jy_base_role_resources t where t.role_id=#{roleId}) tjbrr ON thjbor.resources_id=tjbrr.resources_id WHERE thjbor.org_Id in (SELECT t.orgId FROM jy_base_role t WHERE t.id=#{roleId})) jbor ON jbor.resources_id=jbre.id ORDER BY jbre.parentId,jbre.type,jbre.sort
